Reviews.Title: ASUS Republic of Gamers (ASUS G75VX-BHI7N11)
Reviews.Author: Shejin.S
Reviews.Content: Its totally awesome. I purchased this for gaming after reviewing every other gaming laptops and got it a few days ago.The best thing I noticed is that the Supreme Performance with Awesome Cooling System that keeps it super cool even after playing continuous hours of graphic intense games and thing is absolutely silent. I recommend this product for everyone who wants the best value for your money. This thing got a stunning solid design and build quality is excellent.This is a newer model BHI7N11. Every thing worked fine for me. Perfect for Gaming. Came with Windows 8. I played Battlefield 3 with all setting tuned to ULTRA and works smoothly without even upgrading to latest graphic drivers. Latest Games can run on ULTRA settings without any heat or noise. Sound quality is awesome. Display has great viewing angles. It can even run games smoothly under battery. 1TB 5400RPM HDD is perfectly alright and is able to boot in to Windows 8 in 9 seconds. The GTX 670MX has the latest Kepler architecture that can perform well on the latest gaming titles.ASUS is really the choice of champions.PROS +----------+ Best Cooling System & Super Silent+ Supreme Performance+ Awesome HD Display with brilliant viewing angles+ Great Sound Quality and Sub woofer+ Large TouchPad and Smooth TouchPad Keys+ Fast Boot in 9 seconds+ Awesome full Size Keyboard+ Great DVD drive & latest portsCONS -- Honestly Nothing----------- Some users may feel its bit heavy. But its fine with me.

Reviews.Title: asus g75vx
Reviews.Author: evad
Reviews.Content: wow what a great and powerful machine rarely runs over 100 degrees allday on my lap, a little heavy but the 17.3 screen is amazlng no more hp for me asus is well built and easily upgradeable. thanks asus

Reviews.Title: great laptop but had some problems
Reviews.Author: erin
Reviews.Content: the laptop came with a outdated version of windows 8.0 and the backlit didnt work (were still trying to figure that out)i could not upgrade to windows 8.1 because of the outdated system (also trying to figure THAT out) i could not download java or connect to my microsoft account (im trying to fix that)pros:-good specs-well made chassis-large screen-silent cooling-cool looking (by my standards)cons:-operating system problems-heavy (over 9 pounds)-backlit keyboard not working-java not working-did not come with manuel or any other support items-cannot download apps from windows 8 storeover all, i just need to fix my model of problems but it is still a good value (i bought it for 1150$)

Reviews.Title: Great laptop, enough power for gaming and video editing
Reviews.Author: ian
Reviews.Content: Amazing laptop! It's basically a desktop replacement. All the power you need to render videos, play games or what have you. It boots fast since there is a caching SSD with the large 1TB HDD. The graphics card is good enough you can play all new AAA titles. That's amazing for a laptop. Only downside is it's heavy, but very bearable for a computer like this.

Reviews.Title: Like working on a full desktop - excellent gaming computer!
Reviews.Author: butters
Reviews.Content: Excellent computer - it's like working on a full desktop. Gorgeous screen, fast, quiet and runs cool. It's amazing. Runs games really well - our son used to carry his entire desktop to his friend's every time they had a gaming party - now he just brings this. So nice to have the full keyboard too - the most comfortable laptop ever.

Reviews.Title: s
Reviews.Author: seeyu
Reviews.Content: Product description is not the same, this machine is not new, using nearly 2000 hours, the screen has a blue vertical line.
